content: *classic elegant twin set in lightweight cotton and cropped sleeves for warmer weather sizes s-l 34-38 in/86 5-96 5 cm bust shown in patons grace #60416 blush 3 5 mm us e or 4 crochet hook * skill level intermediate sizes cardigan bust measurement small 34 ins \ 86 5 cm medium 36 ins \ 91 5 cm large 38 ins \ 96 5 cm finished bust measurement small 35 ins \ 89 cm medium 37 ins \ 94 cm large 39 ins \ 99cm materials patons grace 50 g / 1 75 oz sizes s m l cardigan 60416 blush 9 10 10 balls size 3 50 mm u s e or 4 crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge 5 buttons for cardigan construction schematics are provided in patons pdf download february 2008 also available on michaels com 1 see also pretty twin set camisole 2 1 https //web archive org/web/20130620124125/http //www michaels com/patons-grace-crochet-pretty-twin-set/e08277 default pd html 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pretty-twin-set-camisole
